data.title: A 'seismic' Nvidia shift, AI chip shortages and how it's threatening to hike gadget prices
data.description: The AI infrastructure buildout is creating shortages of components including various types of chips that are also used in consumer electronics.
data.author: Arjun Kharpal
data.keywords: NVIDIA Corp,Internet,Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co Ltd,Advanced Micro Devices Inc,Alphabet Class A,Alphabet Class C,Microsoft Corp,Alibaba Group Holding Ltd,Alibaba Group Holding Ltd,Apple Inc,Intel Corp,Xiaomi Corp,Dell Technologies Inc,Technology,Artificial intelligence,Semiconductor device manufacturing,business news
